extendedInfo.description: Quilting Daily is your mobile source for quilting and related news! Quilting Daily Streams news articles from around the woekd and updates them when their available. No Need to wait. Quilting Daily is the best Quilting news app hands down! Read about tips to make you a better quilter or submit your own stories and tips for the other readers. Quilting Daily is an online club for serious quilters. Take pictures of your quilts and send them to us right through this app. They may be displayed on the app! Includes camera app and quilting blog.- #1 Fan App - -Best Quilting News and Blog App Ever! -Not Affiliated with QuiltingDaily.com

reviews.comment: I\'ve quieted for thirty years and found this app. Love it! People need to send pics of their quilts in for inspiration.
reviews.author: A Google User
